attributes.action: Bring back the death penalty for child killers and murders
attributes.additional_details: Current life sentencing is not a good enough deterrent to reduce the heinous crime of premeditated murder.  Murders have increased in our country and clearly the deterrents and courts do not scare these evil people in not committing such crimes. Why should these people live if it’s proven without doubt they are guilty they don’t belong in any society.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Hold a referendum on restoring the Death Penalty for murder
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709623

Bring back the death penalty for homicide of a child
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709710
